Question.Subject: www.buymmoaccounts.com can you tell me what this site is for.?
Question.Content: I am not able to understand the purpose of the site. how is it related to warcraft
Question.ChosenAnswer: Please ignore any site that tries to buy or sell game accounts. It's a pathetic and illegal scam you should stay away from. If you want a real Warcraft account then just go buy one at worldofwarcraft.com :)

Answer.Content: Please ignore any site that tries to buy or sell game accounts. It's a pathetic and illegal scam you should stay away from. If you want a real Warcraft account then just go buy one at worldofwarcraft.com :)
